vote.title: To authorize the appropriation of $57,319.00 within the Neighborhood Initiatives subfund to provide funding for personnel expenses in the Franklin County Municipal Court Self-Help Center. ($57,319.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
This ordinance authorizes the appropriation of $57,319.00 within the Neighborhood Initiatives subfund to the Franklin County Municipal Court to cover fourth quarter personnel cost for the Court’s navigator program and full-time social worker that are both housed within the Self-Help Center at the Court. Since 2023, the navigator program has been critical in assisting residents who are navigating eviction court. The social worker is both a part of the navigator program but additionally is able to assist individuals who may need help accessing services but are not currently under the threat of eviction. These staffers have helped to reduce the workload of court personnel and residents have expressed positive interactions including connection to resources to remain stably housed.
Fiscal Impact: Funding is available within the Neighborhood Initiatives subfund.
Title 
To authorize the appropriation of $57,319.00 within the Neighborhood Initiatives subfund to provide funding for personnel expenses in the Franklin County Municipal Court Self-Help Center. ($57,319.00)
Body
WHEREAS, eviction fillings remain high in our community; and 
WHEREAS, the Self-Help Center has been an invaluable resource to residents who are navigating the eviction process; and
WHEREAS, the Self-Help Center staff have helped to reduce the workload of court personnel and residents have expressed positive interactions including connection to resources to remain stably housed; NOW, THEREFORE,
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1. That the City Auditor is hereby authorized and directed to appropriate $57,319.00 within the Neighborhood Initiatives subfund, fund 1000, subfund 100018, per the accounting code in the attachment to this ordinance.
 
SECTION 2.  That the funds necessary to carry out the purpose of this ordinance are hereby deemed appropriated, and the City Auditor shall establish such accounting codes as necessary.
 
SECTION 3. That this ordinance shall take effect and be in force from and after the earliest period allowed by law.
